context_of_use: This use case allows power users to update their profile information and perform bulk operations on related data.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: wants to maintain accurate account details and improve efficiency through bulk operations.
description: This use case enables power users to update their profile information and perform bulk operations on related data.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a request to manage their profile.
preconditions: Power user is logged into the system.
Power user has the necessary permissions to update profile information.
postconditions: Power user profile information is updated successfully.
Bulk operations are executed as requested.
assumptions: The power user has valid login credentials.
The system supports bulk operations for user profile management.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to update their profile information.
The system shall enable power users to perform bulk operations.
outstanding_issues: Clarification needed on the types of bulk operations supported.
main_flow: 1. power user updates profile information → System saves updated profile information.
2. power user initiates bulk operations → System processes bulk operations.
